description:
A sensor that streams the state of a rectangular LED matrix.
To control the state of the screen, use [LED Matrix Controller](/services/led-matrix-controller) instead.

contents.name: brightness
contents.description: Reads the general brightness of the LEDs. ``0`` when the screen is off.

contents.name: rows
contents.description: Number of rows on the screen

contents.name: columns
contents.description: Number of columns on the screen
